reviewText:
Movie about sex didn't have sex. Yes, once in while some nipples followed by terrible music. Yes, most French flicks are junk not connected to real  life in any manner. Yes, plenty of average looking chicks plus one good looking dog for good use. Plot?--considering nobody work or worry
about money producer concentrated  on  word love--you love me,  you don't, why you don't love me etc. Out of nowhere chick is pregnant etc.
Avoid and try "Baise-moi".

This movie has been heavily cut to "R."  A 40-something art teacher had a fantasy in threesome love.  First, he started to lure one female student in her 20s as his mistress.  Next, he instructed this young student to lure his wife through drawing nude body and making love to each other.  So everyone of these three was working out love both to same and opposite sex partner.  Instead of going to two places, this art teacher convinced his wife to accommodate his student-mistress in his primary house.  Without secret, they slept together on one bed.  His fantasy became a reality.  Shortly after giving birth, his wife left to live with another lesbian.  Not for long.  She preferred to take the threesome and returned to join them.  In style, they lived happier.
There is no explicit love scene and lighting is dark.  The acting of these three cannot motivate erotic sense.  I take this movie as average.  Viewer
may consider movie rental prior to purchase.
This was probably a great movie at one time. The version I received was so edited it was hard to watch.
We didn't stay with it to the end!! You really have to be into nudity to make it through this. We like more story content.

Capt. Freaky was just pleasantly surprised to find this secret gem!  While I can't say that dubbed foreign films are my favorite thing to sit through, this erotic piece was especially sexually tense and nonstop inspiring.

The horrible cover photo doesn't do justice to the young curly haired student, that the art teacher is banging.  His middle aged wife is just "ok", but very believable, as a newcomer to "3-way sex"...she certainly finds out quick that sleeping with "young 20 something vixens" is as hot for "old bags"... as it is for all the dirty old men who want to do it!

I gave this film four stars for at least four very hot sexual encounters that happen in this film.  The background soundtrack leaves a lot to be disired however.  Often, they played a song that sounded like a bad impersonation of Gnarls Barkley...it sounded more like two cats screwing in an ally!  It took away from the hot scene that was on the screen.

The young, hot vixen, has some very nice breasts and its too bad they didn't show much of her hairy bush....there is one shocking scene where a huge dog gets busy with a women...and that came as a huge surprise to me!  Must have been some "peanut butter rubbed in the right places" to get that scene to work....it was very brief however.

All in all....this is another fine European erotic gem that I just discovered.  I recommend it very highly to all middle aged couples "with an open mind".  Guys, your pants will rise quickly, and your wife or girlfriend's thong will be soaking wet long before this film is over....its a better stimulant than Viagra...thats for sure!  Now if we could all find hot 20 somethings who want to join in this kind of fun?  That would be much better than any of these films!  ;)  Just keeping it freaky!
